channel.title: ~Making A Hamachi Server~
channel.description:
[glow=red,2,300]Ok, first, I did NOT leech this. This was made up on the spot... Thank you[/glow]
[glow=green,2,300][u][b]Part 1 - The Downloads[/b][/u][/glow]
[glow=red,2,300]First off, Lets get you the latest java! Here is the link[/glow]: http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp Scroll DOWN and you should see something that says JDK 5.0 Update 9, download it. A Screen should pop up, agree to the terms and click the first box which says "Windows offline installation, Multi-Language,
[glow=red,2,300]Next, Lets get you Hamachi! Here is the link:[/glow] http://www.hamachi.cc/download/ Now, Click the Download which best suits your computer! Done so soon? Go to your Hamachi, in the bottom right corner, you'll see something that looks like a Triangle. Click it, Select "Make New Network" then type in the desired Name & Pass.
[glow=red,2,300]Oops, forgot to get you the Client! Here is the link[/glow]: http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html To download Click Where it says "download [u]Here[/u] or [u]Here[/u]" (The "Here"s obviously)
[glow=red,2,300]Next you need winRAR! Click here for winRAR[/glow]: http://www.rarlab.com/
[glow=red,2,300]OK, Finally, for the last part you need a Source! I perfer TestScape, heres the link![/glow] : http://www.megaupload.com/?d=X9Y464J9 (IMPORTANT) ---> On the top of the page you will see some numbers example -> GFT enter those into the space next to it and press 'download' (CASE SENSITIVE)
Ok, now that we're done with downloads lets move to the next part!
[glow=green,2,300][b][u]Part 2 - The Server Setup[/u][/b][/glow]
This is the easy part, to start off make a folder called "Private Server", or anything that YOU will remember as your server folder.
[glow=red,2,300]Then open up winRAR you should see a file called "TestScape Source" Right-Click it, select "Extract to the Specified Folder" Then when the screen comes up, click your server folder and press "Ok"[/glow]
[glow=green,2,300][b][u]Part 3 - Compiling[/u][/b][/glow]
[glow=red,2,300]Select your Server folder, Open it and you should see something called "Compile" RIGHT-CLICK it and press "Edit", Now delete EVERYTHING in there and change it to this[/glow] [code] @echo off title yourservernamehere "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause[/code]
*Where it says "yourservernamehere" Switch it to well.. Your server's name
[glow=green,2,300][b][i]Part 4 - Runing YOUR private server[/i][/b][/glow]
Ok, this is the last part *Cheers*
[glow=red,2,300]Exit out of Compile, go down and you should see something called "RunServer" Click it and your good to go!
NOW, For the IP address, make sure "RunServer" is up, next make sure you are in your Hamachi network If you look on your Hamachi screen at the top you should see about of numbers (Example.) 5.82.139.224 To log in you use [u][b]THAT[/b][/u] number as the IP:[/glow] And you are done!
[glow=red,2,300]*PLEASE POST ANY QUESTION\COMMENTS AND I WILL BE HAPPY TO ASSIST YOU!*
~Newb~[/glow]

item.title: ~Making A Hamachi Server~
item.dc:creator: @Mladen Mladen
item.description:
@Mladen wrote:

Or just do this

Lol i just created this so tell me what you think

Maybe he needs help, and if you wanna port forward, you must know your private ip which and be found doing this

  1. start-> Control pannel-> Network and Internet Connections -> Then look down should be Internet Connections -> Double click on the one your internet is on -> click on support at the top -> copy your ip adress, and the one thats like 192.168.0.1.

  2. then open your internet to your homepage
    Type:http://192.168.0.1 or whatever yours is.
    Then you’ll get a screen for username and pass
    Username: Admin
    Password: “Blank” or try password or 123

  3. Should open to your router find Games and you should see port forward:

You should see this.
Put in the following.
Make sure you have a no-ip .
www.no-ip.com and register download client make a new no-ip and your done!

“o” Enabled o Disabled
Name: Mopar
Private IP: “your ip adresss”
Protocol Type: Both
Private Port: 43594
Public Port: 43594

go to the link in my signature and please say i helped you
Schedule: Always

Read full topic
